summary: It's the gold rush era in the Wild West. A mysterious stranger (Huckleberry Hound) arrives in a small desert town carrying a huge golden nugget. The notorious Dalton brothers steal it. The town asks "the stranger" to go after them.
cast: Charlie Adler|Michael Bell|Daws Butler|Pat Buttram|Pat Fraley|Allan Melvin|Don Messick|Howard Morris|B.J. Ward|Frank Welker
director: Directors: Bob Goe, John Kimball | 3 more credits Â»
title: El bueno, el malo y Huckleberry Hound
